bibl.title: Local Customs in the Formulas of Sales of Wine for Future Delivery (A Supplement to P. Heid. V).
bibl.note: Additions to the list given in P. Heid. V, pp. 296-301. - Outline summing up the different elements in the formulas. - New readings and interpretations, ordered by nome. - Remarks on the price of wine.
bibl.seg: KRUIT Nico, Local Customs in the Formulas of Sales of Wine for Future Delivery (A Supplement to P. Heid. V).
